name: Weissknight Corporate Finance
overview:
Weissknight Corporate Finance: the leading & growing French advisory boutique based in London.

Weissknight was established to meet the demand of companies looking for independent advices on company valuation and for specific investment banking services. We are dedicated to serve the French and European companies looking for raising funds, restructuring their capital structure, or finding financial buyers based in London. We offer as well specific restructuring advices for UK clients.
